improvement_proposal.fixture:
## Problem Statement
Draft email contract validation has a 23% false-positive rate on signature detection — emails with inline quotes containing '— Name' patterns trigger signature-missing failures.

## Proposed Change
Update validateLlmOutputContract() signature check to only match signatures at the end of the email body (last 5 lines), not anywhere in the content. Add a regex anchor: /— Clint\s*$/m instead of simple string includes.

## Evidence
- 12 trust_validation failures in last 7 days with intent=draft_email, missing_sections=["signature"]
- Manual review shows 9/12 were false positives caused by quoted reply signatures
- Projected improvement: reduce false-positive rate from 23% to <5%
